author: fnathan
title: Defeat is tough on England boss Gareth Southgate… but these are the perils of international football
text:
south-grating Defeat is tough on England boss Gareth Southgate… but these are the perils of international football 
New boss has now seen it all in his short spell in charge, and realises it's all about the cutting edge and having a match-winner he sorely lacks By Neil Ashton, Chief Football Writer 22nd March 2017, 11:31 pm
